data.name: Polygon Attack OST
data.detailed_description:
Polygon Attack Original Soundtrack. Include all menu and gameplay music.

Playlist:


1. Met4you - Starfall

2. Met4you - Let's fly!

3. Met4you - Supernova

4. Met4you - Star Formation

5. Met4you - Final Flight?

6. AstralHorse - Highway

7. AstralHorse - Relaxize

Note:

The OST will be downloaded into the Steam game folder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (x86)
  • Processor: Dualcore AMD 1st gen APU series 1.6 Ghz or Dualcore Intel Celeron 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 512mb video memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: Dualcore AMD 1st gen APU series 1.6 Ghz or Dualcore Intel Celeron 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AC97 or HD audio support
